entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Richmond
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 10:32 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 5.5°C
Wind: SSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except northwest 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
